headline: Cerence AI to Present at 27th Annual Needham Growth Conference

headline: Cerence extends its partnership with Nvidia

headline: Cerence AI expands collaboration with Nvidia for CaLLM family of language models
summary: Cerence (CRNC) announced an expanded collaboration with NVIDIA (NVDA) to advance the capabilities of its CaLLM family of language models, including its cloud-based Cerence Automotive Large Language Model and its CaLLM Edge embedded small language model. Through this collaboration, CaLLM is powered by NVIDIA AI Enterprise, an end-to-end, cloud-native software platform, and some aspects of CaLLM Edge are powered by NVIDIA DRIVE AGX Orin. headline: Cerence stock soars over 140% on new AI partnership with Nvidia
summary: Cerence (CRNC) — an artificial intelligence developer that works with a multitude of major automakers — shares skyrocket by over 140% in Friday's session after announcing an AI partnership with Nvidia (NVDA) Josh Lipton and Josh Schafer break down these stock movements and the details of Cerence's new partnership with Nvidia. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.

headline: SoundHound Rival Cerence AI Scores Nvidia Automotive Pact. Shares Surge.
summary: Cerence AI, a rival of SoundHound, announced an automotive pact with Nvidia. Cerence stock popped, SoundHound stock also gained.
